name: d3-interpolate-path
description: Interpolates path `d` attribute smoothly when A and B have different number of points.
author: Peter Beshai <peter.beshai@gmail.com> (http://github.com/pbeshai)

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --config rollup.config.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-interpolate-path.js -c -m -o build/d3-interpolate-path.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-interpolate-path.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-interpolate-path.js build/d3-interpolate-path.min.js
